description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任安徽省人民政府省长，第八、第九届全国政协常委。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government and was a Standing Committee member of the 8th and 9th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任安徽省省长及省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor and Party Secretary of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任安徽省省长、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Governor of Anhui and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都和直辖市。
description.en: The capital and a direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省会。
description.en: The capital city of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的一所著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

en: Standing Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会
en: Anhui Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 傅锡寿毕业后曾任职于鞍山钢铁公司。
description.en: Fu Xishou worked at Anshan Iron and Steel Company after graduation.

description.zh-cn: 傅锡寿曾任职于重庆钢铁设计院。
description.en: Fu Xishou once worked at Chongqing Iron and Steel Design Institute.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：傅锡寿接替卢荣景担任安徽省人民政府省长。
description.en: Succession of office: Fu Xishou succeeded Lu Rongjing as Governor of Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 职务接替：回良玉接替傅锡寿担任安徽省人民政府省长。
description.en: Succession of office: Hui Liangyu succeeded Fu Xishou as Governor of Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 傅锡寿是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Fu Xishou was a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 傅锡寿曾任第八届、第九届全国政协常委。
description.en: Fu Xishou served as a Standing Committee member of the 8th and 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.
